meanings.sent1: She showed great cojones when she stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's cojones helped him rescue the cat from the tree.
meanings.sent3: Despite her fear of heights, she climbed the ladder with cojones.
meanings.sent4: His cojones in the face of danger inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's cojones in battle were unmatched.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined his cojones during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: The boxer took a hit to the cojones during the match.
meanings.sent3: He joked about his cojones being too sensitive to cold weather.
meanings.sent4: The statue of the Greek god had exaggerated cojones.
meanings.sent5: The dog playfully chased after the ball, wagging his cojones.
